attributes.comment:
I think the proposed increase in Fees will have a very negative impact on the
international adoption community at large. We are currently in the process of
adopting our child(ren) from China and we will soon have to re-file our I-600A due
to its expiration while waiting to complete the process. If the fees must increase,
then the expiration date should be extended to match the realistic time tables of
the international adoption programs. The increase in fees and re-filing places a
very heavy burden on the adoptive parents. This may drive many potential parents
away from the programs. This would be a tragedy for those children waiting for
loving homes.

Jarrett & Melissa Addison
Cairo, GA
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Jarrett & Melissa Addison
